name: RipEarth
description: RipEarth is a game made by Malo Kerrand and Jean Claude Lebegue during the Global Game Jam 2020. The theme was "repar". The earth is devasted by humans, so your mission is to repar it by exterminated every human. This is a beat 'em up game. The graphics have been found in each.io and the musics made by a kind man that we don't remember the name, sorry !
